1.title: Twisted Metal

episode of.title: The Town That Time Forgot (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: After their car gets into a head on collision while drunk a group of friends wake up in a hospital and as they set out to find what happened to them, they discover that reality is bending around them inside this otherworldly town.

2.title: No Escape

episode of.title: The Town That Time Forgot (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Upon discovering that the town is a sort of "limbo" for the living, the friends try find a way to escape from its darkness.

3.title: The Oathkeeper

episode of.title: The Town That Time Forgot (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: The trio discover that the town preys on "sin" and "guilt" and a hulking monstrous humanoid clad in bandages and nails known as "The Oathkeeper" passes out judgment on those who cannot complete the trials presented within the town.

4.title: Transcendence

episode of.title: The Town That Time Forgot (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: The group learn of a man who has lived in the town for what some people say is hundreds of years. They say that he knows the secrets of the town and is willing to aid anyone in escaping...for a price.

5.title: The Price of Freedom

episode of.title: The Town That Time Forgot (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: In the season finale, the group rallies together with residents of the town in an effort to finally escape its clutches by escaping the only way they can, completing each of their personal trials all while being hunted by The Oathkeeper.

imdb.title: The Town That Time Forgot
plot: A horror anthology series about an unnamed town that draws in hopeless people and begins altering reality itself around them while they confront their past, present and futures.::J.W. Ross - Series Creator
